pkgmetadata.longdescription: One-Sided Multinomial Probabilities // Implements multinomial CDF (P(N1=n1, ..., Nk=nk)) and tail probabilities (P(N1n1, ..., Nknk)), as well as probabilities with both constraints (P(l1N1=u1, ..., lkNk=uk)). Uses a method suggested by Bruce Levin (1981) doi:10.1214/aos/1176345593.
